Strings.Text: The ladder leads to the \npoisonous gas area. {pause}{clear}To go down the ladder, a gas \nmask is needed.{pause}
A sign is posted. It reads, \n“DANGER ROUTE CLOSED DUE TO {pause}{clear}POISONOUS GASES IN AREA \nMUST WEAR GAS MASK TO GO {pause}{clear}TO THE MISSILE SILO UP AHEAD”.{pause}
This area is full of poisonous \nspores emitted by the poisonous {pause}{clear}plants. If inhaled, they could be \nlife threatening.{pause}
